description: Main application structure with dependency injection, routing configuration, and keyboard shortcuts integration

components.LuxeNailsApp: Root application StatelessWidget providing dependency injection, keyboard shortcuts, and Material App configuration.

components.ToggleFullscreenIntent: Intent class for F11 and Alt+Enter fullscreen toggle keyboard shortcuts.

components.ExitAppIntent: Intent class for ESC key application exit keyboard shortcut.

rules: Root application widget with comprehensive dependency injection using Provider pattern.
MultiProvider setup with all major MobX stores: Dashboard, Tickets, Employees, Services, Customers, Appointments, Settings.
Post-frame callback initialization for stores requiring Flutter services (DashboardStore, SettingsStore).
Comprehensive keyboard shortcuts: F11/Alt+Enter (fullscreen), ESC (exit app).
WindowService integration for fullscreen toggle and application exit functionality.
MaterialApp.router configuration with GoRouter integration for declarative routing.
App theme integration with centralized light theme configuration.
ErrorLogger integration with detailed logging for store creation and app lifecycle.
Debug banner disabled for production-ready appearance.
Store lifecycle management with proper initialization timing and dependencies.
Actions and Shortcuts widgets for keyboard shortcut handling with Intent pattern.
Callback actions for fullscreen and exit intents with async operation support.
Provider-based dependency injection ensuring single store instances across app.
Post-frame initialization strategy preventing premature store operations before Flutter readiness.
Centralized error handling and logging for debugging and monitoring.
Professional app structure following Flutter best practices and patterns.
Keyboard accessibility with common desktop application shortcuts.

components.AppRouter: Static router configuration class providing GoRouter setup with shell routes and error handling.

rules: Declarative routing configuration using GoRouter with shell route pattern.
Initial location set to /dashboard as main entry point for POS application.
Root redirect from '/' to '/dashboard' for consistent user experience.
ShellRoute integration with AppShell for consistent navigation across all screens.
Comprehensive route definitions: dashboard, tickets, appointments, calendar, customers, employees, services, reports, settings, checkout.
Nested route support with ticket detail routes using path parameters (:ticketId).
Debug logging enabled for development with debugLogDiagnostics.
Error builder with professional error screen showing error icon and message.
Coming soon placeholder screens for features under development.
Route names for programmatic navigation and deep linking support.
Path parameter extraction for dynamic routes (ticket detail screen).
Professional error handling with user-friendly error screens.
Consistent screen structure with proper Material Design error states.
Static helper methods for reusable UI components (error, coming soon screens).
Scalable routing architecture supporting future route additions.
Navigation integration with app shell for persistent navigation rail.
Error state management with graceful degradation for route failures.

components.StartupScreen: Startup StatefulWidget handling initial app setup with professional loading UI and error handling.

components._StartupScreenState: State management for app initialization with loading states, error recovery, and navigation flow.

rules: Professional startup screen with branded gradient background and loading animations.
App initialization workflow with automatic navigation to dashboard on completion.
Error handling with retry functionality and graceful failure recovery options.
Loading states with circular progress indicator and status message updates.
Professional branding with app logo, gradient styling, and spa icon integration.
Error dialog with retry and continue anyway options for user choice.
Logger integration for debugging app initialization flow and error tracking.
Status message updates during initialization process for user feedback.
Gradient background with primary blue theming and professional visual design.
Container constraints (max width 400px) for consistent dialog-style appearance.
Version information display for app identification and support purposes.
Loading animation with white background container and shadow effects.
Error state visualization with red-themed error container and icon.
GoRouter integration for declarative navigation to dashboard.
Mounted checks for safe state updates during async initialization.
Post-frame callback usage for proper initialization timing.
Professional typography with headline and body text styling.
Responsive design with center alignment and proper spacing.
App title and subtitle with consistent branding and professional appearance.
